task.question: What happened at the height of the power of the goat in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:8)?

choices.choice: The goat fell and the ram trampled him
The goat’s large horn was broken off
The goat was shot with an arrow
The goat was trapped in a net and carried away

task.answer: The goat’s large horn was broken off

task.question: After the goat’s horn was broken off what happened in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:8)?

choices.choice: The goat ran off into the wilderness
The goat was shot with an arrow
The horn was ground to dust and scattered

task.question: How did Daniel identify the land where the small horn that grew up out of the four horns toward (Dan 8:9)?
The little horn of Daniel’s vision grew until it reached what (Dan 8:10)?
What did the goat threw down to the earth and trample on in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:10)?

choices.choice: The governors and satraps of Persia

task.question: The goat set itself up to be as great as _________ (Dan 8:11)?
What was taken away when the goat set itself up as great as the Prince of the host in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:11)?

choices.choice: The reading of the Law of Moses
The fasting over the destruction of Jerusalem

task.question: Under the goat what was trown to the ground (Dan 8:12)?

choices.choice: The leader of the host of heaven

task.question: What question did one holy one ask another in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:13)?

choices.choice: When will the promises to David be fulfilled
How long until Israel can return
How long until the vision is fulfilled
How long, O Lord, will you forget your people Israel

task.answer: How long until the vision is fulfilled

task.question: The holy one asked when all of these from the vision would be fulfilled EXCEPT (Dan 8:13)?

choices.choice: The vision concerning the daily sacrifice
The host would remain in exile
The host will be trampled underfoot

task.answer: The host would remain in exile
